title: Demand-Driven Online Mathematics Learning Design and Mastery of Strategic Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational math concepts and experience applying them to tasks
context.additional_context: Customized Training for In-Service Professionals Aiming to Improve Work-Centered Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills in VR-Based Simulation Environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete VR simulation tasks based on work scenarios with over 90% accuracy
Learners can develop and implement customized learning plans based on demand analysis results at least three times
Learners can conduct math problem-solving workshops with peer learners using online collaboration tools at least twice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
